mapper.select: select M.ch_no,I.ch_name,M.ch_msg_no,M.user_id,M.msg_content,M.msg_date,E.emp_image from ch_msg_tb M join emp_tb E on M.emp_no = E.emp_no join ch_info_tb I on M.ch_no = I.ch_no where M.ch_no = ${chNo} and M.ch_msg_no > ${chMsgNo} order by M.msg_date

select M.ch_no,I.ch_name,M.ch_msg_no,M.user_id,M.msg_content,M.msg_date,E.emp_image from ch_msg_tb M join emp_tb E on M.emp_no = E.emp_no join ch_info_tb I on M.ch_no = I.ch_no where M.ch_no = ${chNo} and M.ch_msg_no > (select max(M.ch_msg_no) - ${chMsgNo} from ch_msg_tb) order by M.msg_date
select M.ch_no, I.ch_name, E.emp_no, E.emp_name, E.emp_image, reg_Id, user_id from ch_member_tb M join emp_tb E on M.emp_no = E.emp_no join ch_info_tb I on M.ch_no = I.ch_no where M.ch_no = #{chNo}
